actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility investigations of a potential water resource development.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to investigate the feasibility of the Trinity River Division, Whiskeytown Powerplant, Central Valley Project, California.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility investigations of a potential water resource development.
